title: Insert query
sql: INSERT INTO SampleTable (column1, column2, ..) VALUES (value1, value2, ..)

title: Update query
sql:
UPDATE SampleTable SET column1 = value1,
column2 = value2,
..
WHERE condition

title: Create table
sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SampleTable (attribute1 type1, attribute2 type2, ..)

title: Rename table
sql: ALETR TABLE SampleTable RENAME TO new_name

title: Add table attribute
sql: ALTER TABLE SampleTable ADD COLUMN column_definition

title: Insert rows from one table to another
sql: INSERT INTO desctination SELECT * FROM source

title: Duplicate table
sql: CREATE TABLE new_table AS SELECT * FROM existing_table

title: Create view
sql: CREATE VIEW view_name AS SELECT * FROM existing_table
